TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class HierarchicalDataSourceControl : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataSourceControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource
Public MustInherit Class HierarchicalDataSourceControl Inherits Control Implements IHierarchicalDataSource
public ref class HierarchicalDataSourceControl abstract : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IHierarchicalDataSource
type HierarchicalDataSourceControl = class inherit Control interface IHierarchicalDataSource

summary.span: 提供代表階層式資料之資料來源控制項的基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for data source controls that represent hierarchical data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援可讓 Web 伺服器控制項繫結至資料並以一致的方式呈現資料控制項資料繫結架構。ASP.NET supports a controls data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data and present it in a consistent fashion. 繫結至資料的 web 伺服器控制項稱為資料繫結控制項，並輔助繫結的類別則稱為資料來源控制項。Web server controls that bind to data are called data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate binding are called data source controls. 資料來源控制項可以代表任何資料來源： 檔案、 資料流、 關聯式資料庫、 商務物件等等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a file, a stream, a relational database, a business object, and so on. 資料來源控制項資料繫結控制項，不論來源或基礎資料的格式一致的方式呈現資料。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 代表階層式資料的資料來源控制項是衍生自類別，而代表清單或資料表的資料的資料來源控制項是衍生自類別。Data source controls that represent hierarchical data derive from the class, while data source controls that represent lists or tables of data derive from the class. 類別是基底實作介面，它會定義單一方法來擷取資料來源控制項相關聯的階層式資料來源檢視物件， 。The class is the base implementation of the interface, which defines a single method to retrieve hierarchical data source view objects associated with the data source control, . 您可以將資料來源控制項的組合視為物件和其相關聯的檢視，對基礎資料，稱為資料來源檢視物件。You can think of a data source control as the combination of the object and its associated views on the underlying data, called data source view objects. 代表表格式資料的資料來源控制項通常只有一個具名的檢視，與相關聯時類別支援的資料來源控制項所代表的階層式資料的每個層級的資料來源檢視。While data source controls that represent tabular data are typically associated with only one named view, the class supports a data source view for each level of hierarchical data that the data source control represents. 階層式資料的層級由唯一的階層式路徑，傳遞給方法中的`viewPath`參數。The level of hierarchical data is identified by a unique hierarchical path, passed to the method in the `viewPath` parameter. 每個物件定義的階層式層級表示，資料來源控制項功能，並執行作業，例如 insert、 update、 delete 和排序。Each object defines the capabilities of a data source control for the hierarchical level represented, and performs operations such as insert, update, delete, and sort. Web 伺服器控制項衍生自類別，例如，使用階層式資料來源控制項繫結至階層式資料。Web server controls that derive from the class, such as , use hierarchical data source controls to bind to hierarchical data. 資料來源控制項都會實作為啟用宣告式的持續性，並選擇性地允許參與狀態管理的控制項。Data source controls are implemented as controls to enable declarative persistence and to optionally permit participation in state management. 資料來源控制項有沒有視覺化呈現，並因此不支援佈景主題。Data source controls have no visual rendering, and therefore do not support themes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充抽象類別和類別，並實作和介面來建立階層式資料來源擷取檔案系統的控制資訊。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the abstract class and the class, and implement the and interfaces to create a hierarchical data source control that retrieves file system information. `FileSystemDataSource`控制項可讓 Web 伺服器控制項繫結至物件，並顯示基本的檔案系統資訊。The `FileSystemDataSource` control enables Web server controls to bind to objects and display basic file system information. `FileSystemDataSource`範例中的類別可實作方法，它會擷取`FileSystemDataSourceView`物件。The `FileSystemDataSource` class in the example provides the implementation of the method, which retrieves a `FileSystemDataSourceView` object. `FileSystemDataSourceView`物件會從基礎資料儲存區，在此情況下在 Web 伺服器上的檔案系統資訊中擷取資料。The `FileSystemDataSourceView` object retrieves the data from the underlying data storage, in this case the file system information on the Web server. 基於安全考量，檔案系統資訊的資料來源控制項用於 localhost 時，才會顯示、 已驗證的案例，和與使用資料來源控制項的 Web Form 網頁所在的虛擬目錄，才會啟動。For security purposes, file system information is displayed only if the data source control is being used in a localhost, authenticated scenario, and only starts with the virtual directory that the Web Forms page using the data source control resides in. 最後，兩個類別可實作並提供給包裝物件`FileSystemDataSource`使用。Finally, two classes that implement and are provided to wrap the objects that `FileSystemDataSource` uses. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式繫結若要使用的檔案系統資料的控制項`FileSystemDataSource`範例。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a control to file system data using the `FileSystemDataSource` example. [!code-aspx-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1/CS/webform7cs.aspx#50)] [!code-aspx-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_webform_1/VB/webform7vb.aspx#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這方法提供的預設實作類別，只會傳回`null`。This method provides the default implementation for the class, which simply returns `null`. 衍生自類別類別覆寫這個方法，並提供實作，以傳回衍生自的強型別的檢視。Classes that derive from the class override this method and provide an implementation to return a strongly typed view that derives from . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，在該類別可擴充類別，以傳回強型別物件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a class that extends the class to return a strongly typed object. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDataSourceChanged (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnDataSourceChanged : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnDataSourceChanged : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法告知資料繫結控制項基礎資料來源或在記憶體中快取的資料已變更，控制項應該重新繫結，而且應該執行任何必要的工作。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source or the data cached in memory has changed, that the control should rebind, and that any necessary work should be performed. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Custom Event DataSourceChanged As EventHandler Implements System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource

summary.span: 發生於 變更而影響資料繫結控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the has changed in some way that affects data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 就會引發事件時，資料繫結控制項或基礎資料的屬性已變更而影響資料繫結控制項和其資料之間的資料繫結中。The event is raised when the properties of a data-bound control or the underlying data has changed in some way that affects the data bindings between a data-bound control and its data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端會呼叫方法時操作為介面。The method is called by clients when a is manipulated as an interface. 它會委派至方法，衍生類別覆寫以傳回強型別物件。It delegates to the method, which derived classes override to return strongly typed objects.
